title: 501(c)(3) status documentation
dataVerified: Organization name, officers, board members, EIN, IRS determination
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Tax-exempt status (active/revoked). Link to IRS/tax authority system (public and donors, may require authentication)
rationale: Prevents fake charities. Domain binding verifies IRS/tax authority. IRS letters suitable for OCR. Permanent legal status. Donor verification. Similar to donation receipts anti-impersonation pattern.
